full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

The Government of Canada is seeking a potential lessee to lease up to 8-residential units to the Public Works and Government Services Canada (PSPC).  The PSPC is interested in leasing residential units in the Hamlet of Cambridge Bay with the following characteristics:

### Essential Criteria

* 6 two-bedroom units with 1 energized parking space per unit
* 2 one-bedroom units with 1 energized parking space per unit
* Lease term of approximately 5 years, commencing on or about July 1, 2023

### Lease Requirements

* Each proposed residential unit must meet the following criteria:
	+ A living room, dining area, kitchen with a full size stove and refrigerator, 1 full bathroom, on-site laundry with full size washer and dryer, and sufficient residential storage space
	+ A heat recovery ventilator (HRV)
	+ If not connected to the Hamlet of Cambridge Bay's water and sewer infrastructure system, a self-contained water and sewage tank is required
	+ Compatible with PSPC's intended use of the accommodation
	+ Located in the Hamlet of Cambridge Bay
* Reserving the right to install equipment to monitor fuel, water, and electricity consumption

### Compliance Requirements

* Compliance with PSPC's Standards for Leased Residential Accommodation, Canada Labour Code, Canadian Electrical Code, National Building Code of Canada, and all other applicable Codes and Standards.
* Compliance with local laws and by-laws.

### Additional Information

The PSPC is seeking a lessee who can demonstrate the ability to provide a safe and secure environment for the residential units. The PSPC may wish to visit or inspect the proposed space upon reasonable notice and a threat and risk assessment may be undertaken to assess potential threats to the security of the proposed space and to the public.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Candace Joudrey at (431) 777-5041 or candace.joudrey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Documentation

For more information and to obtain the complete tender package, please visit the following website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/28/db7e74ddfe0a30ed6549daa85df1d6ae/20221018_eoi_-_en_-_inuinnaqtun.pdf or https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/
